reviewText: Never got to use or even see the workout as the disc will not scroll down to the primary workout.

This was one of the first video's I used when I first started doing Pilates, the results were instantaneous. This video is amazing if you enjoy Pilates like I do, then do this every morning to start your day and you will notice results immediately. Its quick and you will feel refreshed and ready for your day.

This pilates DVD by Mari Winsor is one of the best I have used.  I owned it previously but my daughter "confiscated" it when she moved.  This is a replacement since I just had to have it.  Amazing what 20 minutes can do.  You do have to have some knowledge of her technique but even if you don't, you soon will have it by the 2nd workout. There is no serious lag in between sets and the pace is fairly brisk (which I like).  You see real results with this video pretty quickly to say nothing of your improved posture and strengthened core. I alternate between treadmill and this pilates workout and get fantastic results. I know I need to add a few sessions of weight training to this routine ... someday.
I didn't think 20 minutes could do so much! I've been using it for a week and I already feel the Burn!
Excellent whole body workout in 20 minutes!
Great workouts in little time. Advanced.
I love this DVD. Exactly the kind of workout I was looking for.
Great video and workout!  I would recommend this to anyone who wants to tone their core.  I really like this product
Its a good video but it doesn't work out our legs only tummy I prefer the accelerated video that one is great
